# AI Market Research Report

## Overview

According to the [McKinsey Global Institute 2023 Annual Report](https://www.mckinsey.com/ai-report-2023), AI adoption is accelerating across industries. The Stanford HAI 2023 Index measured a 35% increase in enterprise AI deployments year-over-year [Source: https://aiindex.stanford.edu/report/].

## Key Findings

- The global AI market reached $150.2 billion in 2023 according to [IDC Worldwide AI Spending Guide](https://www.idc.com/promo/ai-spending-guide)
- Companies using AI report a 37% average productivity improvement per the [Accenture Technology Vision 2023](https://www.accenture.com/technology-vision-2023)
- 78% of enterprises plan to increase AI spending by 2025, per [Gartner IT Spending Forecast Q3 2023](https://www.gartner.com/en/newsroom/press-releases/ai-spending-2025)

## Market Analysis

The Deloitte 2023 Enterprise AI Survey of 2,800 executives found that industry leaders are investing heavily in AI infrastructure [Ref: https://www2.deloitte.com/ai-survey-2023]. Cloud-based AI solutions dominate with a 3.2x increase in adoption since 2020, as measured by [Flexera 2023 State of the Cloud Report](https://www.flexera.com/cloud-report-2023).

The total addressable market for AI tools was valued at $515.31 billion by [Grand View Research](https://www.grandviewresearch.com/industry-analysis/artificial-intelligence-market) in their 2023 market analysis report.
